name: Mochi's Adventure
description:
2D platformer game where you control a little mochi that can transform in 2 states. Complete the different levels while you collects all the fruits.

Thanks to POLO DIGITAL for giving us a place to develop and EOI for the opportunity to learn about Unity . Also special thanks to our teachers who made this project possible dear:

Fran Gomez, Elena Blanes, Alex Montero & Alberto Ruiz.

Credits:
